name: TheGloriousQuran(English)
0:
”Alexa, ask my fellow muslim, to recite the Quran.”
”Alexa, ask my fellow muslim, to recite surah Rahman.”
”Alexa, ask my fellow muslim, read surah one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my fellow muslim
des:
You can ask Alexa to read Surahs from the Quran (in English) and much more!

Some Surahs can be recited in Arabic also!

Get today's date on the Islamic calendar

Try these utterances:

"Alexa, ask my fellow Muslim to read surah one"
"Alexa, recite Surah Yaseen"
"Alexa, ask my fellow Muslim what is today's date.
"Alexa, ask my fellow Muslim, what is the Islamic date"
"Alexa, ask my fellow Muslim, recite the Quran"

and more!

Arabic Surahs supported:

*Fatiha
*Rahman
*Ya-seen
*Ikhlas
*Nas
*Kafirun
*Falaq
*Mulk
*Muzzamil
*Baqarah

(note: Islamic calendar feature require Premium version)
